descriptionHtml:
This is a helmet called the \'Helm of Storms\', it is a re-textured version of the \'Helm of Yngol\'.

The helmets enchantments are:
Fortify Shouts
Reduce destruction cost by 10%
Resist elements by 25%
Shock Cloak damages enemies with 5 shock damage if they get too close

[u]v1.2[/u]
The helm now randomly spawns at one of five shrines of Talos
There will be a notification \"Thunder rumbles in the distance\", then you will know the helmet spawned properly and the mod is working. If you don\'t see this, try changing the load order.

Please don\'t forget to try my other mod \"Sweetroll Randomization Act\"
author: Darthhister
